docs.snippet: Seibu Holdings Inc and top shareholder Cerberus Capital Management LP will seek to relist the Japanese company in the coming months, sources said, allowing the U.S. investor to cash out most of its $1 billion-plus investment and ending a spat seen...
docs.lead_paragraph: Seibu Holdings Inc and top shareholder Cerberus Capital Management LP will seek to relist the Japanese company in the coming months, sources said, allowing the U.S. investor to cash out most of its $1 billion-plus investment and ending a spat seen as a test of Japan's openness to foreign capital.

headline.main: Exclusive: Seibu to Seek Tokyo Listing, Ends Spat With Cerberus-Sources
headline.print_headline: Exclusive: Seibu to Seek Tokyo Listing, Ends Spat With Cerberus-Sources

docs.snippet: The numbers are unmistakable, scientists say. Global sea levels are rising, while land along the East Coast is sinking. Just ask Norfolk, Va....
docs.lead_paragraph: The numbers are unmistakable, scientists say. Global sea levels are rising, while land along the East Coast is sinking. Just ask Norfolk, Va.
docs.abstract: Scientists point to unmistakable evidence that global sea levels are rising and could increase as much as three feet by end of century, particularly if greenhouse gas emissions continue unchecked; rising tides pose enormous risk for United States, particularly along East Coast, where much of population and economy is concentrated.
